src:
Spar Slovenija podaril tono in pol hrane za živali v stiski
05 Nov 2019, 12:25 by M. L.-S.
Kočevje - Delovanje neprofitnih organizacij, ki skrbijo za zapuščene živali, je pogosto odvisno od donacij. V Sparu Slovenija so zato tudi letos organizirali dobrodelno akcijo Veseli repki, iskreni nasmehi, s katero so že sedmo leto zapored opozorili na pomen pravilnega odnosa do malih živali in hišnih ljubljenčkov.
S pomočjo svojih dobaviteljev so zbrali 1.500 kg hrane ter 1.200 priboljškov in pripomočkov, ki so jih razdelili med šest neprofitnih organizacij iz cele Slovenije. Med doniranci sta bili tudi Društvo za zaščito živali Novo mesto in Društvo za zaščito živali Kočevje, ki je donacijo prejelo za pomoč mačkam, ki živijo v Mačji vasici.
Ostali prejemniki donacije so bili še: Društvo Srce za bulle, Društvo za zaščito živali Maribor, Društvo Hrtji svet Slovenije in Obalno zavetišče.
text:
Spar Slovenia donated a ton and a half of food for animals in need
05 Nov 2019, 12:25 by M. L.-S.
Kočevje - The operation of nonprofit organizations that care for abandoned animals often depends on donations. This year Spar Slovenia also organized the charity action Happy Tails, a sincere smile, which reminded for the seventh consecutive year of the importance of the right attitude towards small animals and pets.
With the help of their suppliers, they collected 1,500 kg of food and 1,200 treats and gadgets, which were distributed to six non-profit organizations from all over Slovenia. The donors included the Novo mesto Animal Welfare Society and the Kočevje Animal Welfare Society, which received a donation to help cats living in Cat Village.
Other recipients of the grant were: the Heart for the Bulls Society, the Animal Protection Society of Maribor, the Greyhound Society of Slovenia and the Coastal Shelter.
